title: Source Shared
description: Shared properties of record source models.

sourceName.description: The name of the source, used in internal representations

displayName.description: The display name of the source

owner.description: The name of the source owner

ownerEmail.description: The email of the source owner

recordCount.description: The number of records in this source

online.description: Whether the source is online for query

pipelineIndex.description: The index to generate a query pipeline, built based on the distribution of the data
